amendment.description: To enhance and extend the increase in the amount of the death gratuity.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1376 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1376 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S8632-8633; text: CR S8632) To enhance and extend the increase in the amount of the death gratuity.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1376 proposed by Senator Levin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1376 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
